Our products

Terminal, Risk management, Brokerage

Tradelize.Terminal is the first revolutionary DMA (Direct Market Access) standalone software solution with easy and accessible interface for trading on major global cryptocurrency exchanges, providing all the liquidity the crypto economy has to offer. Handcrafted by traders for traders with LOVE and UNDERSTANDING.

Tradelize Features

Arbitrage
finder

Simultaneous tracking of preset crypto price pairs on all major exchanges

Level
2

Liquidity depth view for all major crypto exchanges in one place or separately for each exchange

Portfolio
view

Observe all trades, profits and balances in fiat or cryptocurrency of your choice

Full interface
customization

Set up any number of tools, scale, or group and automatically save your layout

Risk management
tool

Wide range of risk management settings for individual and corporate use

SMART
orders

Be sure to pick the best execution price and liquidity offered by major crypto exchange

Comparative
tables

Comparative tables for prices on major crypto exchanges, in all cryptocurrencies

Sorting
function

Sorting function for all crypto pairs (by prices, volumes, and amount)

APP

Tradelize mobile app is here to give you access to fast and simple trading on the go. You will be able to conveniently manage your account, browse ProTraders, and quickly replicate their trading strategies – all with just a few taps on your mobile device. Easy and effective.
